metadata.name: More Special Rooms in Greed Mode
metadata.description:
Don't you think that having only Curse Rooms in Greed Mode is dumb? Well, this mod fixes this! Now Curse Rooms have a chance to be replaced by: Dice Rooms, Chest Rooms, Challenge Rooms, Libraries and Arcades, Barren Rooms, Isaac's Room and Planetariums! (Only if you don't have Planetariums in Greed Mode mod)
This mod is compatible with: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2818356312]Tainted Treasures![/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2717876263]Alt path in Greed Mode![/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2626756137]Greed Mode Improved![/url]
